verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:26
verses.text: And she said, Oh my lord, as thy soul liveth, my lord, I am the woman that stood by thee here, praying unto the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:27
verses.text: For this child I prayed; and the Lord hath given me my petition which I asked of him:

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:28
verses.text: Therefore also I have lent him to the Lord; as long as he liveth he shall be lent to the Lord. And he worshipped the Lord there.
